#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40754#issuecomment-1431675916: 
   * introduce `cond::service::PoolDBOutputService::kSharedResource`
   * use the `cond::service::PoolDBOutputService::kSharedResource` resource in `ConditionDBWriter<T>`
   * rationalize `usesResource()` in the classes in all classes in the `ConditionDBWriter<T>` hierarchy and remove unnecessary dependencies

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.
